1.16.5.1.0.1:
Fixed Ticking block entity on Bound Soul crash.
Fixed missing Loot Table error (for test.json).
1.16.5.1.5.0:
Added mist - Gravestones, Bound Souls, and Wither Tree's poison and wither mist.
Added Key Ring.
Added key merging ability.
Added treasure maps to other Treasure chests.
Updated bounding boxes of gravestones.
Fixed Well and Wither Tree regitries.
Attempt to fix LockItem.appendHoverText initialization crash with some performance mods.
Uses Forge-36.2.0
1.16.5.1.6.0:
Added Charms (except Harvesting).
Added Pouch Item.(standard only, Lucks, Apprentice and Master will not be added).
Uses GottschCore 1.4.0 which fixes crash bug on mob spawn by ProximitySpawner.
Prevent crashes when coins thrown in wells has an exception.
1.16.5.1.6.1: Fixed Curios required crash (it is optional).
1.16.5.1.7.0:
Added Adornments.
Changed ReflectionCharm from LivingDamageEvent to LivingHurtEvent, so that the full amount of damage is reflected back at the mob.
Update loot tables.
Removed exposing Loot Tables to the file system, ie loot table json files will no longer be copied to /config or worldsave/datapack directories.
Moved /loot_tables into domain specific folder.
Fixed stone lock display name.
1.16.5.1.7.2:
Fixed CharmRandomly crash if no charm is selected.
Re-add ability to add custom loot tables to the save game folder.
Enable treasure2 bracelets to be placed in Curios bracelet slot.
1.16.5.1.7.3:
Fixed No Chest Gen on Reload issues.
Fixed Wither Tree Top (broken log) not having a bounding box.
Fixed Locks not displaying accepted key(s) properly.
1.16.5.2.1.1:
Bring to parity with 1.12.2-v2
New Charms/Runes/Adornments system.
Added 300+ adornments.
Added 9 runes.
Charms now range in levels 1-25+.
Added Cheat Death charm.
Added Legendary and Mythical rarities.
Added Legendary, Mythical loot tables.
Removed exposing resources files (loot tables, meta, structure) to the file system.
Refactored how deep treasure pits go - no longer based on offset from bottom, but on rarity of loot.
Updated requirement for GottschCore 1.15.0.
Fixed the no loot from wishing wells bug.
Added 5 million downloads reward ring.
Fixed Jewelers Table bug.
Fixed [1.12.2] Key duplication with the Key Ring. #290.
1.16.5.2.2.0:
Refactor chest/well/wither tree spawn calculation and registration.
Add Poison/Wither resistance and immunity charms.
Update Key and Lock items for future expansions.
Add injectable loot tables for treasure loot pools.
Fix duplicate load of loot table resources.
Fix file system subfolder creation in datapacks folder.
Fix Pouch duplication bug.
Fix Keyring duplication bug.
1.16.5.2.3.0:
Updates to be more extensible.
Fix whitelisted dimensions server crash bug.
